interpretation: The snowflake emoji represents purity, uniqueness, and transience. Just as each snowflake is one-of-a-kind, so too are the situations and experiences we encounter in life. The snowflake reminds us to embrace our individuality and to appreciate the fleeting moments that make life so special. This card can also represent a need for purification or a fresh start, as snow often symbolizes a clean slate. Be aware of any negative patterns or emotions that may be weighing you down, and let the snowflake inspire you to let go and start anew. Keywords associated with this card include purity, uniqueness, transience, fragility, beauty, and new beginnings.
